job_description:
Senior Go Developer - Cloud Infrastructure Team

We are looking for an experienced Senior Go Developer to join our cloud infrastructure team.

Requirements:
- 5+ years of software development experience
- Strong expertise in Go programming
- Experience with Kubernetes and container orchestration
- Cloud platform experience (AWS/GCP/Azure)
- Microservices architecture knowledge
- Database design and optimization
- Leadership and mentoring experience

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable Go services
- Lead architectural decisions for cloud infrastructure
- Mentor junior engineers
- Collaborate with DevOps and infrastructure teams
- Optimize performance and reliability

additional_context.content: Company focuses on cloud-native infrastructure solutions for enterprise clients. Strong emphasis on performance, scalability, and reliability.
